events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund because this product isn't suitable for me.
The system or agent has categorised this inquiry as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a refund.
This case has been assigned to the refunds team for further assistance and processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can check the details and assist you better?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item was not as described on the website, and I would prefer to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process and send you a prepaid return label so you can ship the item back at no cost.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate your quick response and help with the return shipping.
The refund process has been started, and you should receive the return label via email shortly. Once we get the item back, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to confirm that you received the return label and to ask if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have sent the item back yesterday. Thanks again for your help!
Your refund has been processed successfully, and the case is now closed. Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you need anything else.
We’ve sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support team today. Your feedback is very important to us.
